WorkItem.ClosedComment: closing this issue, creating a new one
WorkItem.Description:
attached is the Rawr.Rogue model that is under development.  To use it, copy the attached Rawr.Rogue.dll into your Rawr\Data directory, in (the same place where Rawr.Bear.dll is located)
 
Recent Updates:
- basic Envenom model (Rev 0)
- HAT
- Fixed Bug in Relentless Strikes
- Poison Normalized PPM
 
Not modeled yet:
- glyphs
- riposte
- ghostly strike
- Killing Spree
- Savage Combat
- Anesthetic Poison
 
 
Any constructive feedback is welcome!

Comments.Message:
Found in build 33645 and earlier:
Unable to use Wound/Wound (And poisons do not appear to be working of the normalized proc per minute).  I can only get wound to work correctly if I put deadly in my mainhand.
One of the parts of HAT is using Hemo when combo points are too low.  While the current implementation of HAT is actually pretty close to what's needed, could another box be added next to it with average Hemo's a minute?  Hemo is used when you have a bad group composition and have to fight for your combo points while waiting for HAT to kick in to 5.
Also, being able to see the energy return from Ruthlessness would be nice HAT wise as well, since that can be 1k energy a fight or more.

ok.  small update:
- fixed the wound poison bug, and added cycle time into the calc.  
- added Poison Hit into the display (since it uses spell hit rates)

Right now, poisons don't use the normalized PPM, they's based on the hit rates from WowHead.  I'll see about adding the PPM
I'll add the ruthlessness & Hemo requests next

update:
- changed Instant & Wound Poison to use PPM
- Added Relentless Strikes enery return to output display

- updated dll
